citations.narrative:
Records of the IACUC meeting minutes and semiannual reports to the IO from the previous year were located off site and
not available for review at the time of inspection. Inspection of these records is necessary for evaluation of compliance
under the AWA. Per this section, all required records must be available for inspection by authorized APHIS
representatives.
To be corrected by March 1st, 2023.

The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2022, due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st, 2022, was
submitted on January 9th, 2023. Timely submission of the annual report is essential to assure that professionally
acceptable standards governing the care and use of animals were followed during the previous fiscal year. Per this
section of the regulations, each reporting facility shall submit an annual report, covering the use of live animals in the
previous fiscal year, on or before December 1st of each calendar year.
To be corrected from this point forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.35(f) 
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
Records of the IACUC meeting minutes and semiannual reports to the IO from the previous year were located off site and 
not available for review at the time of inspection. Inspection of these records is necessary for evaluation of compliance 
under the AWA. Per this section, all required records must be available for inspection by authorized APHIS 
representatives.  
To be corrected by March 1st, 2023. 
2.36(a) 
   
Annual report. 
The facility's annual report for fiscal year 2022, due to the Deputy Administrator on or before December 1st, 2022, was 
submitted on January 9th, 2023. Timely submission of the annual report is essential to assure that professionally 
acceptable standards governing the care and use of animals were followed during the previous fiscal year. Per this 
section of the regulations, each reporting facility shall submit an annual report, covering the use of live animals in the 
previous fiscal year, on or before December 1st of each calendar year. 
To be corrected from this point forward. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.

End Section
